tasks.title: Bootstrap PRD tracking artifacts
tasks.description: Create PRD.json and progress.txt to enforce Ralph methodology tracking.
tasks.validation: PRD.json and progress.txt exist in repo root.

tasks.title: Stabilize CIP WebAPI gateway and tag mirroring
tasks.description: Ensure CIP gateway serves /tags reliably and mirrors DO/DI, AO/AI, timer, counters, and reset behavior against cpppo server.
tasks.validation: CIP /tags returns tag list; FUXA CIP view updates; reset and counters behave as specified.

tasks.title: Diagnostics: capture gateway traffic for CIP
tasks.description: Update diagnostics capture logic so CIP captures include WebAPI gateway traffic on port 9000 alongside CIP port 44818.
tasks.validation: Capture menu produces pcap containing CIP and WebAPI traffic when gateway is active.

tasks.title: Implement MQTT protocol lab with direct FUXA connection
tasks.description: Set up MQTT broker/device bridge and FUXA MQTT client tags for canonical IO with timer/counter/reset logic.
tasks.validation: FUXA MQTT view updates and mirrors IO; diagnostics can capture MQTT traffic.

tasks.title: Fix MQTT connection status and IO updates in FUXA
tasks.description: Ensure FUXA MQTT device connects cleanly and the MQTT bridge publishes expected IO for the Test Bench.
tasks.validation: MQTT connection status is green and DO/AO changes update DI/AI/TMR/CNT on MQTT Test Bench.

tasks.title: Remove duplicate CIP Test Bench view
tasks.description: Delete extra CIP Test Bench view so only one CIP view remains in FUXA.
tasks.validation: FUXA Views list shows a single CIP Test Bench entry.

tasks.title: Harden labctl when no proto-server containers exist
tasks.description: Prevent labctl from failing when no proto-server containers are running.
tasks.validation: labctl switch works cleanly with zero proto-server containers.
